name: Heart of Darkness
description:
Heart of Darkness is an arcade game developed by Amazing Studio. It was originally released in 1998. It was published by Infogrames. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Heart of Darkness on Game Boy Advance, PlayStation and PC.
It was produced by Jon Norledge. It was directed by Eric Chahi and Fabrice Visserot. It was scored by Bruce Broughton.
